title: Disposition of unclaimed vehicle
context: [ยง290-10] Disposition of unclaimed vehicle. Whenever a county ordinance authorizes the police or other agency designated by the mayor of the county to remove and store vehicles, a vehicle removed and stored under authority of such ordinance may be deemed to have been abandoned for the purposes of this chapter if not claimed within twenty-four hours by a person entitled to possession. Such vehicle may be disposed of in accordance with this chapter for the disposition of abandoned vehicles. [L 1971, c 28, pt of ยง1]
